speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: Alack, alack, Edmund, I like not this

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: unnatural dealing. When I desired their leave that I

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: might pity him, they took from me the use of mine

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: own house, charged me on pain of perpetual

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: displeasure neither to speak of him, entreat for

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: him, or any way sustain him.

speaker: EDMUND
text: Most savage and unnatural.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: Go to; say you nothing. There is division

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: between the dukes, and a worse matter than that. I

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: have received a letter this night; ’tis dangerous to

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: be spoken; I have locked the letter in my closet.

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: These injuries the King now bears will be revenged

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: home; there is part of a power already footed. We

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: must incline to the King. I will look him and privily

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: relieve him. Go you and maintain talk with the

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: Duke, that my charity be not of him perceived. If he

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: ask for me, I am ill and gone to bed. If I die for it, as

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: no less is threatened me, the King my old master

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: must be relieved. There is strange things toward,

speaker: GLOUCESTER
text: Edmund. Pray you, be careful.

speaker: EDMUND
text:
This
               
              courtesy
               
              forbid
               
              thee
               
              shall
               
              the
               
              Duke

speaker: EDMUND
text:
Instantly
               
              know
              ,
               
              and
               
              of
               
              that
               
              letter
               
              too
              .

speaker: EDMUND
text:
This
               
              seems
               
              a
               
              fair
               
              deserving
              ,
               
              and
               
              must
               
              draw
               
              me

speaker: EDMUND
text:
That
               
              which
               
              my
               
              father
               
              loses
              —
              no
               
              less
               
              than
               
              all
              .

speaker: EDMUND
text:
The
               
              younger
               
              rises
               
              when
               
              the
               
              old
               
              doth
               
              fall
              .
